content.rendered:
Public Equity Plans Administration

Incentivize Employees.
Stay Compliant.

Now that you’ve scaled, compliance is more important than ever. With Altshare, you never have to worry about it.

Compliance, Without the Chaos.

Before Altshare

You're trying to recruit and keep top talent, but manually managing employee incentive plans is stealing away time from your true focus. Meanwhile, you're updating share plan transactions by hand -- without a clue if you're actually doing everything by the book..

After Altshare

Now with Altshare you automate and streamline the equity plans administration process -- from enrollment to liquidation. So you get back to boosting your talent game and never have to wonder if you're staying compliant.

request a demo

Employee Incentive Plans
that Work For You

All Your Plans,
All In One Place.

Seamlessly manage ESPPs, RSUs and option plans all in one, connected platform. So you auto-fill granting documents, sign enrollment documents and get board approvals faster and easier than ever.

All Your Plans, All In One Place.

Seamlessly manage ESPPs, RSUs and option plans all in one, connected platform. So you auto-fill granting documents, sign enrollment documents and get board approvals faster and easier than ever.

Compliance at
Every Step

Ensure you always follow the rules with built-in compliance automations that are constantly updated with the newest regulations. So you never miss a step, and get constant compliance from start to finish.

Compliance at Every Step

Ensure you always follow the rules with built-in compliance automations that are constantly updated with the newest regulations. So you never miss a step, and get constant compliance from start to finish.

Empower Your
Employees

Remove the barrier between employees and their equity plans. Now all your employees manage their plans independently through the Employee Portal.

Empower Your Employees

Remove the barrier between employees and their equity plans. Now all your employees manage their plans independently through the Employee Portal.

Trade Shares.
Anywhere.

Let employees easily trade shares with Altshare's global network of brokers. No matter where you're traded, we've got your back.

Trade Shares. Anywhere.

Let employees easily trade shares with Altshare's global network of brokers. No matter where you're traded, we've got your back.

Founders Taking Ownership of
Equity Plans Administration

Inbal Myers
Director of Finance, Rapyd

“Instead of complex and expensive manual term sheet analysis, AltShare’s solution does it all automatically - cap table management, waterfall analysis, modeling…and more!”
Leeron Aran
VP Finance, Guesty

“AltShare’s 409A Valuation Solution is a game-changer for us. The fact that we can produce work paper-ready, defensible 409A valuations in less than an hour – and without hiring a consultant – is changing the way we handle our valuations.”
Roei Khermosh
CFO, Papaya Global

“AltShare helps me access my portfolio with a user friendly interface. I would suggest this product to any company that want's to offer stocks to their employees.”
Stephanie Pardo
CFO , Shift Technology

“Easy to navigate the equity management and platform which include a dashboard view and menu with features like updated cap table, ESOP Management, 409A valuations and more.”
Jonathan Eldan
VP Finance, LawGeex

“I like how this software generate all required reports, analyses and is user friendly. Very easy to run waterfall scenarios based on the company's cap table and also very easy to understand the graphs that are generated.”
Eli Kalman
VP Finance, WSC Sports Technologies

“Analytical tools are great. The software is also very flexible and allows for individual customization of many items.”
Tal Brener
CFO, Natural Intelligence

“AltShare is extremely friendly and flexible and helps me manage the employee’s equity in an easy efficient way, it saves overheads, improves accuracy and serve the variety of the corporate needs.”
Eyal Toledano
Co-Founder & CTO, Zebra Medical

“Altshare is a must have for any company looking to streamline the complex equity management process. Not only does it save us a ton of time, but it also provides our employees & shareholders a level of transparency that is unmatched.”
request a demo
